conclusion: Initial analysis of shadows changing in position and size due to light source movement
Shadows will shift backward as the light source moves forward
Shadows will become smaller due to steeper angle of light rays
Shadow A (Sphere) will move backward and reduce in size
Shadow B (Blue Cylinder) will shift backward and become narrower
Shadow C (Cake) will move backward and become smaller in diameter
Shadow D (Waffle) will shift backward and reduce in size
Summary of shadows moving backward and becoming smaller
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D will shift backward and reduce in size
